
= Header

This is a *paragraph*. Yes,
it _extends_ itself on
multiple lines.

This is another
paragraph.

==Subheader

This is another
paragraph.

- list +item 1+
- list +item 2+

Example:

  <?php
  class A extends B
  {
    
  }
  ?>

  <?php
  $this->a();
  ?>

You may use +$this->a()+.
See <tt>B::a()</tt> for more help,
or just <tt>a</tt>.
